summary: The customer is looking to upgrade their 55-inch LED Smart TV from Contoso Wireless in order to access streaming services like Netflix and Hulu. The agent explained that there are three options for upgrading the TV: purchasing an external streaming device, a Smart TV adapter, or an HDMI streaming device. The external streaming device offers the most flexibility but is also the most expensive, while the Smart TV adapter and HDMI streaming device are less expensive but may not have access to as many streaming services.
